channel.title: Posts on Stars and the Underground
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Stars and the Underground

item.title: News: New Single
item.description: We are due back in the studio, at the end of January to record a new single “Nosferatu Upon Tyne”. We are recording at Arch Hill Recording Studios in Auckland with John McDermott.

item.title: Shows: Shadowplay, Wellington, 09 11 2019
item.description: Congratulations to our new member Cat (pictured left) who performed her first show with us at Shadowplay in Wellington.
